Title: Shostakovich - Festive Overture in A Major, Op. 96 | Nobel Prize Concert 2009
Description:
From the Stockholm Concert Hall
The Nobel Prize Concert with the Crown Princess, Victoria

The Royal Stockholm Philharmonic Orchestra
Yuri Temirkanov - conductor

Dmitri Shostakovich - Festive Overture in A Major, Op. 96

Click here to watch the full Nobel Prize Concert: https://goo.gl/7thmTX
Subscribe to EuroArts: https://goo.gl/jrui3M

As part of the official Nobel Week, the Royal Stockholm Philharmonic Orchestra under Yuri Temirkanov plays Festive Overture in A Major, Op. 96 by Dmitri Shostakovich. Members of the Swedish Royal Family as well as guests of the Nobel Foundation are also attending the highly acclaimed event, which gathers internationally renowned artists and conductors each year.

Title: Martha Argerich: Ravel - Piano Concerto in G Major | Nobel Prize Concert 2009
Description:
From the Stockholm Concert Hall,
The Nobel Prize Concert with the Crown Princess, Victoria

Martha Argerich - piano
The Royal Stockholm Philharmonic Orchestra
Yuri Temirkanov - conductor

Maurice Ravel - Piano Concerto in G Major
0:00 I.  Allegramente
8:40 II. Adagio assai
18:44 III. Presto

Click here to watch the full Nobel Prize Concert: https://goo.gl/7thmTX

Click here to compare Martha Argerich's interpretation with David Fray's: https://youtu.be/cJOW5mlhH_Y
Subscribe to EuroArts: https://goo.gl/jrui3M

As part of the official Nobel Week, the world’s most renowned artists are gathering each year to pay tribute to the Nobel Laureates. The 2009 concert offered a special highlight in the series with Martha Argerich performing Ravel’s Piano Concerto in G Major by Maurice Ravel under Yuri Temirkanov, this time leading the Royal Stockholm Philharmonic Orchestra. Members of the Swedish Royal Family as well as guests of the Nobel Foundation are also attending the highly acclaimed event, which gathers internationally renowned artists and conductors each year.

Title: Mussorgsky - Pictures at an Exhibition (St. Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra, Yuri Temirkanov)
Description:
From the Annecy Classic Festival 2014,
Yuri Temirkanov conducts the Saint Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra
Watch more of the Annecy Classic Festival: https://bit.ly/EA-AnnecyClassicFestival

Chapters:
0:00 Intro
1:06 I. Promenade 
3:00 II. Gnomus 
6:13 III. Promenade 
7:15 IV. Il vecchio castello 
11:41 V. Promenade 
12:15 VI. Tuileries 
13:30 VII. Bydło 
16:02 VIII. Promenade 
16:50 IX. Ballet of the Chickens in their Shells
18:13 X. "Samuel" Goldenberg und "Schmuÿle" 
20:43 XI. Limoges, le marché (The Market Place at Limoges)
22:10 XII. Catacombæ (Sepulcrum romanum)
26:34 XIII. Baba-Yaga's Hut on Chicker Legs
29:55 XIV. The Great Gate of Kiev 

Compare with the performance by Kurt Masur and the Leipzig Gewandhaus Orchestra: https://youtu.be/Sq7Qd9PSmR0

Watch also the piano version performed by Evgeny Kissin: https://youtu.be/rH_Rsl7fjok
Subscribe: https://goo.gl/jrui3M

Title: Shostakóvich – Festive Overture Op. 96 (St. Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra, Yuri Temirkanov)
Description:
From the Philharmonic Hall St. Petersburg, (starts at 0:25)
On the eve of St. Petersburg 300th birthday, Yuri Temirkanov conducts the St. Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra

Yuri Temirkanov - conductor
St. Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra

Dmitri Shostakovich - Festive Overture in A major, Op. 96

Click here to watch the full concert on the occasion of the St. Petersburg 300th birthday: https://youtu.be/nESdk_MxBMQ
Subscribe to EuroArts: https://goo.gl/jrui3M

St. Petersburg, Russia's fabled "window to Europe", celebrates its anniversary presenting a gala of distinguished musical art where Yuri Termirkanov conducts one of the oldest Russian symphonic ensemble: the St Petersburg Philharmonic.

ストラヴィンスキー：ペトルーシュカ（1947年版）
ユーリ・テミルカーノフ指揮　レニングラード・フィル交響楽団
1973年1月26日　モスクワ音楽院ホール　ライブ録音
※若き日のテミルカーノフの代表的名演。オーケストラは有名なフィルハーモニーとは別団体です。翌1974年にこのコンビで初来日し、東京文化会館「ペトルーシュカ」を演奏したのを聴きましたが、当時のソ連のオーケストラの底力を感じさせるものでした。

1/10/1968 Leningrag Philharmony Hall live recording(monaural)
チャイコフスキー：ピアノ協奏曲第1番
ピアノ）グリゴリー・ソコロフ
ユーリ・テミルカーノフ指揮　レニングラード交響楽団
1968年10月1日　レニングラード、フィルハーモニーホール　ライブ録音（モノラル）
※ソコロフ18歳の時の白熱のライブ。テミルカーノフが当時29歳でレニングラード交響楽団の首席就任直後の公演。二人は1966年にそれぞれチャイコフスキー・コンクール、全ソ連指揮者コンクールの覇者となっていました。

Title: Tchaikovsky: 1812 Overture - Yuri Termirkanov, conductor
Description:
Piotr Ilych Tchaikovsky (1840 - 1893)

이 곡은 1812년 모스크바에서 나폴레옹을 물리친 것을 기념하기 위해 구세주 그리스도 대성당 완공 기념식을 위해 차이코프스키가 작곡한 곡으로, 러시아 원정 승리 70주년이 되던 1882년에 모스크바 산업예술 박람회의 특별 공연에서 초연되었으나 큰 주목을 받지 못했다고 한다.
이후 1891년 차이코프스키가 뉴욕의 카네기 홀 개장 축하공연에서 이 곡을 직접 지휘해 큰 성공을 거두게 된다.

연주의 마지막 부분에 대포 발사 시퀀스가 유명한데, 야외에서나 혹은 야외 축제에서 공연할 때는, 진짜 대포를 발사하기도 한다. 실내에서 이 작품이 연주될 때는, 컴퓨터가 생성한 대포 소리를 사용하기도 하며 큰 배럴 드럼을 사용하기도 한다.

오늘 소개하는 차이코프스키 탄생 150주년 기념공연에서 직접 대포를 발사하는 장관을 연출한다.
제가 1990년 초기에 구입한 Laser Disc에서 영상을 발췌했다.

Leningrad Philharmonic Orchestra
and Leningrad Military Orchestra
Yuri Termirkanov, conductor

Video sources: Laser Disc - Tachaikovsky Gala in Leningrad

#1812Overture #Tchaikovsky #YuriTermirkanov

Title: Шостакович - 10-я симфония - Темирканов - Вербье-2009
Description:
ТВ-рип с "Культуры" от 27.09.2011


17:35  27.09.11  Шостаковичу посвящается... Симфония № 10
Исполняют Юрий Темирканов и фестивальный оркестр Вербье. 
http://www.tvkultura.ru/page.html?cid=666&p=12


Д. Д. Шостакович (1906-1975)

Симфония № 10. Ми минор. Опус 93

1953

В рукописи окончание первой части датировано 5 августа, второй — 27 августа, третьей — 8 октября, четвертой — 25 октября.

1. Moderato  -  см. с 4:10

2. Allegro  -  см. с 30:08

3. Allegretto  -  см. с 34:20

4. Andante. Allegro  -  см. с 46:06




Звук программно акустически улучшен.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

В лучшем качестве (похоже на DVD-rip, звук - СТЕРЕО) собственно музыкальную часть записи смотрите здесь: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Yi7W1NKpgo
